pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stepwise Covariate Selection for the Fine Gray Competing Risks Regression Model // Performs forward and backwards stepwise regression for the Proportional subdistribution hazards model in competing risks (Fine Gray 1999). Procedure uses AIC, BIC and BICcr as selection criteria. BICcr has a penalty of k = log(n*), where n* is the number of primary events.
